node.title: heaven
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `heaven` ( `node_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type_nodetype` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `killa_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `reputation` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`), KEY `killa` (`killa_user`), KEY `author` (`author_user`), KEY `authortype` (`author_user`,`type_nodetype`), KEY `killatype` (`type_nodetype`,`killa_user`), KEY `heaven_author_user` (`author_user`), KEY `title` (`title`), KEY `author_user__title` (`author_user`,`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
